Date Not Selected Height value should be between 15-140cm Weight value should be between 100-40000gram GN Area is not filled Birth and Immunization Number is not filled Birth and Immunization Number is not in correct format Name of the child is not filled Date of Birth is not filled Address is not filled Name of Mother is not filled Mothers date of birth is not filled Birth weight (in grams) is not filled Length at birth (in cm) is not filled Occupation specification is mandatory is self employed/retired/paid If caregiver is not mother, caregiver name is mandatory Length in Centimeters is allowed 10-99 Weight in Grams is allowed 500-9999 Number of Children allowed is 1-20 Land Number is not filled Land Number has less/more characters Mobile Number is not filled Mobile Number has less/more characters Child with same Immunization number already exists in PHM area
Demographic information Date of registration GN area (Free text) * Birth and Immunization Register Number (Free text) * Name of the child (Free text) * Sex (dropdown list) * Date of birth * Ethnicity (dropdown list) * Address (Free text) * Sector (drop down list) * Land line number Mobile number
Mother\'s information Occupation * Name of the mother * Mother\'s date of birth * Number of living children including this child If self employment, paid employment or retired, please specify mother\'s occupation Highest education level * NIC number
Care giver\'s information Caregiver\'s relationship to child * If caregiver is not the mother, caregiver\'s name Newborn\'s information Length at birth (cm) * Weight at birth (grams) * Submit

Stage 1: Reason for enrollment Date SAM (checkbox) MAM (checkbox) Long standing growth faltering in green zone (checkbox) Underweight (checkbox) Overweight/obesity (checkbox) Stunting (checkbox) The selection combination is invalid. Stunting \n6. SAM + Underweight \n7. MAM + Underweight \n8. Overweight + Underweight \n9. Longstanding Growth Faltering Zone \n10. SAM \n11. MAM \n12. Underweight
Intervention - Poverty and Poor Income Management Date of Intervention Agriculture based entrepreneur training Agriculture based livelihood support Asset transfer to establish livelihood Commercial livestock and poultry support Empowerment training Financial literacy Training Provision of Samurdhi Provision of Samurdhi bank loan Support community water harvesting for commercial cultivation Value chain support and increased market access
Food Insecurity Date of Intervention Agriculture skills training/ technical support Live stock and poultry support projects for households Support home gardening Support household water harvesting /water irrigation projects Training to reduce post harvest loss
Inadequate water, sanitation and Hygiene Date of Intervention Assess hand washing facilities Assess toilet facility against local standards Awareness on safely managed drinking water Awareness on WASH practices Enrolment to house construction/renovation programme Establish water treatment method to community water supply scheme Improve existing water source(from unprotected to protected) Introduce alternative water sources (rain water harvesting) Introduce household water treatment methods Monitor safely managed sanitation Provide access to safe water supply systems Provide improved sanitation/latrine facilities Renovation of tube well Water quality monitoring
